text: Heath Miller (born July 15, 1983 in Pineville, West Virginia) is an American professional wrestler. He currently wrestles for Impact Wrestling under the ring name Heath. He is also known for his time in the WWE where he wrestled under the ring name Heath Slater. He was a member of the stables 3MB and The Nexus. Slater has won the WWE Tag Team Championship three times with Justin Gabriel. He also won a Slammy Award in 2010 for the debut of The Nexus. Slater's finishing move is the Smash Hit which is a spinning lifting DDT. ==Championships== *Florida Championship Wrestling **FCW Florida Heavyweight Championship (one time) **FCW Southern Heavyweight Championship (one time) **FCW Florida Tag Team Championship (one time) (with Joe Hennig) *Georgia Championship Wrestling **NWA/GCW Columbus Heavyweight Championship (one time) *Pro Wrestling Illustrated **PWI Feud of the Year (2010) (The Nexus vs. WWE) **PWI Most Hated Wrestler of the Year (2010) (as part of The Nexus) **He was ranked #66 of the top 500 singles wrestlers in the PWI 500 in 2011. *World Wrestling Entertainment/WWE **WWE Tag Team Championship (three times) (with Justin Gabriel) **Slammy Award for Shocker of the Year (2010) (The debut of The Nexus) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:Professional wrestling managers and valets Category:Sportspeople from West Virginia Category:Total Nonstop Action Wrestling people
title: Heath Slater
